name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: [SOUND] This lecture is a continued

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: discussion of Latent Aspect Rating Analysis.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _Earlier
column6: we talked about how to solve the problem of LARA in two stages. _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: But we first do segmentation of different aspects.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And then we use a latent regression model to learn the aspect ratings and

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: then later the weight.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Now it's also possible to develop a unified generative model for

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _solving this problem
column6: and _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: that is we not only model the generational over-rating based on text.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _We also model the generation of text
column6: and so _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: a natural solution would be to use topic model.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _So given the entity

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: we can assume there are aspects that are described by word distributions.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Topics.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And then we an use a topic model to model the generation of the reviewed text.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: I will assume words in the review text are drawn from these distributions.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: In the same way as we assumed for generating model like PRSA.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And then we can then plug in the latent regression model to

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: use the text to further predict the overrating.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And that means when we first predict the aspect rating and

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: then combine them with aspect weights to predict the overall rating.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _So this would give us a unified generated model

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: where we model both the generation of text and the overall ready condition on text.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: So we don't have time to discuss this model in detail as in

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _many other cases in this part of the cause where we discuss the cutting edge topics

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: but there's a reference site here where you can find more details.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: So now I'm going to show you some simple results that you can get

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: by using these kind of generated models.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _First
column6: it's about rating decomposition. _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _So here
column6: what you see are the decomposed ratings for _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: three hotels that have the same overall rating.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _So if you just look at the overall rating

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: you can't really tell much difference between these hotels.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: But by decomposing these ratings into aspect ratings

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _we can see some hotels have higher ratings for some dimensions

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _like value
column6: but others might score better in other dimensions

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And so this can give you detailed opinions at the aspect level.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _Now here
column6: the ground-truth is shown in the parenthesis

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: it also allows you to see whether the prediction is accurate.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: It's not always accurate but It's mostly still reflecting some of the trends.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: The second result you compare different reviewers on the same hotel.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: So the table shows the decomposed ratings for two reviewers about same hotel.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Again their high level overall ratings are the same.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _So if you just look at the overall ratings
column6: you don't really get that much _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: information about the difference between the two reviewers.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _But after you decompose the ratings

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: you can see clearly that they have high scores on different dimensions.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: So this shows that model can review differences in opinions of different

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: reviewers and such a detailed understanding can help us understand

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: better about reviewers and also better about their feedback on the hotel.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _This is something very interesting

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: because this is in some sense some byproduct.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _In our problem formulation
column6: we did not really have to do this. _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: But the design of the generating model has this component.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And these are sentimental weights for words in different aspects.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And you can see the highly weighted words versus the negatively loaded weighted

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: words here for each of the four dimensions.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _Value
column6: rooms

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _The top words clearly make sense
column6: and the bottom words also make sense. _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _So this shows that with this approach

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: we can also learn sentiment information directly from the data.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _Now
column6: this kind of lexicon is very useful because in general

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _let's say
column6: may have different sentiment polarities for different context. _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _So if I say the battery life of this laptop is long
column6: then that's positive. _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _But if I say the rebooting time for the laptop is long
column6: that's bad

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _So even for reviews about the same product
column6: laptop

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _the word long is ambiguous
column6: it could mean positive or it could mean negative. _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _But this kind of lexicon
column6: that we can learn by using this kind of generated _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _models
column6: can show whether a word is positive for a particular aspect. _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _So this is clearly very useful
column6: and in fact such a lexicon can be directly used _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: to tag other reviews about hotels or

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: tag comments about hotels in social media like Tweets.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _And what's also interesting is that since this is almost completely unsupervised

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: well assuming the reviews whose overall rating are available And

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: then this can allow us to learn form potentially larger amount of data on

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: the internet to reach sentiment lexicon.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And here are some results to validate the preference words.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Remember the model can infer wether a reviewer cares more about service or

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: the price.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Now how do we know whether the inferred weights are correct?

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And this poses a very difficult challenge for evaluation.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Now here we show some interesting way of evaluating.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _What you see here are the prices of hotels in different cities
column6: and _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: these are the prices of hotels that are favored by different groups of reviewers.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: The top ten are the reviewers was the highest

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: inferred value to other aspect ratio.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _So for example value versus location
column6: value versus room

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Now the top ten of the reviewers that have the highest ratios by this measure.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And that means these reviewers tend to put a lot of

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: weight on value as compared with other dimensions.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: So that means they really emphasize on value.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: The bottom ten on the other hand of the reviewers.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _The lowest ratio
column6: what does that mean? _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Well it means these reviewers have put higher weights on other aspects

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: than value.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: So those are people that cared about another dimension and they didn't care so

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _much the value in some sense
column6: at least as compared with the top ten group. _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Now these ratios are computer based on the inferred weights from the model.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: So now you can see the average prices of hotels favored by top ten reviewers

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: are indeed much cheaper than those that are favored by the bottom ten.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And this provides some indirect way of validating the inferred weights.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: It just means the weights are not random.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: They are actually meaningful here.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _In comparison
column6: the average price in these three cities

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _you can actually see the top ten tend to have below average in price

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _whereas the bottom half
column6: where they care a lot about other things like a service or _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: room condition tend to have hotels that have higher prices than average.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: So with these results we can build a lot of interesting applications.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _For example
column6: a direct application would be to generate the rated aspect

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: and because of the decomposition we have now generated the summaries for

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: each aspect.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: The positive sentences the negative sentences about each aspect.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: It's more informative than original review that just has an overall rating and

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: review text.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Here are some other results

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: about the aspects that's covered from reviews with no ratings.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _These are mp3 reviews

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: and these results show that the model can discover some interesting aspects.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Commented on low overall ratings versus those higher overall per ratings.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And they care more about the different aspects.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Or they comment more on the different aspects.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _So that can help us discover for example
column6: consumers' _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: trend in appreciating different features of products.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _For example
column6: one might have discovered the trend that people tend to _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _like larger screens of cell phones or light weight of laptop
column6: etcetera. _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Such knowledge can be useful for

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: manufacturers to design their next generation of products.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Here are some interesting results on analyzing users rating behavior.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: So what you see is average weights

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: along different dimensions by different groups of reviewers.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And on the left side you see the weights of viewers that like the expensive hotels.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _They gave the expensive hotels 5 Stars
column6: and _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: you can see their average rates tend to be more for some service.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _And that suggests that people like expensive hotels because of good service

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: and that's not surprising.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: That's also another way to validate it by inferred weights.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _If you look at the right side where
column6: look at the column of 5 Stars. _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _These are the reviewers that like the cheaper hotels
column6: and _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: they gave cheaper hotels five stars.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _As we expected and they put more weight on value

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: and that's why they like the cheaper hotels.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _But if you look at the
column6: when they didn't like expensive hotels

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: then you'll see that they tended to have more weights on the condition of

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: the room cleanness.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _So this shows that by using this model
column6: we can infer some _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: information that's very hard to obtain even if you read all the reviews.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Even if you read all the reviews it's very hard to infer such preferences or

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: such emphasis.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: So this is a case where text mining algorithms can go beyond what

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _humans can do
column6: to review interesting patterns in the data. _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And this of course can be very useful.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _You can compare different hotels

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _compare the opinions from different consumer groups
column6: in different locations. _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _And of course
column6: the model is general. _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: It can be applied to any reviews with overall ratings.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: So this is a very useful technique that can

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: support a lot of text mining applications.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Finally the results of applying this model for personalized ranking or

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: recommendation of entities.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _So because we can infer the reviewers weights on different dimensions

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: we can allow a user to actually say what do you care about.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _So for example
column6: I have a query here that shows 90% of the weight _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: should be on value and 10% on others.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: So that just means I don't care about other aspect.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: I just care about getting a cheaper hotel.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: My emphasis is on the value dimension.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Now what we can do with such query is we can use reviewers that we

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: believe have a similar preference to recommend a hotels for you.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: How can we know that?

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _Well
column6: we can infer the weights of those reviewers on different aspects. _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _We can find the reviewers whose weights are more precise

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: of course inferred rates are similar to yours.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And then use those reviewers to recommend hotels for you and

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: this is what we call personalized or rather query specific recommendations.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _Now the non-personalized recommendations now shown on the top

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _and you can see the top results generally have much higher price
column6: than the lower _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: group and that's because when the reviewer's cared more about the value as

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: dictated by this query they tended to really favor low price hotels.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: So this is yet another application of this technique.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: It shows that by doing text mining we can understand the users better.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And once we can handle users better we can solve these users better.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _So to summarize our discussion of opinion mining in general

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: this is a very important topic and with a lot of applications.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And as a text sentiment analysis can be readily done by

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: using just text categorization.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: But standard technique tends to not be enough.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And so we need to have enriched feature implementation.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And we also need to consider the order of those categories.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And we'll talk about ordinal regression for some of these problem.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: We have also assume that the generating models are powerful for

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: mining latent user preferences.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: This in particular in the generative model for mining latent regression.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And we embed some interesting preference information and

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: send the weights of words in the model as a result we can learn most

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: useful information when fitting the model to the data.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Now most approaches have been proposed and evaluated.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _For product reviews
column6: and that was because in such a context

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: the opinion target are clear.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: And they are easy to analyze.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _And there
column6: of course
column7: also have a lot of practical applications. _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _But opinion mining from news and social media is also important
column6: but that's _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _more difficult than analyzing review data
column6: mainly because the opinion holders and _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: opinion targets are all interested.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: So that calls for

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: natural management processing techniques to uncover them accurately.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: Here are some suggested readings.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _The first two are small books that are of some use of this topic

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: where you can find a lot of discussion about other variations of the problem and

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: techniques proposed for solving the problem.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: The next two papers about generating models for

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: rating the aspect rating analysis.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: _The first one is about solving the problem using two stages
column6: and _

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: the second one is about a unified model where the topic model is integrated

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: with the regression model to solve the problem using a unified model.

name: 5 - 5 - 4.5 Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis- Latent Aspect Rating Analysis Part 2 (00-14-43).srt
text: [MUSIC]
